title: 我的世界怎么设置圈地上限
author: a7115016
txt_content:
才一格就超过了允许的范围上限   具体怎么设置啊

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
residence插件配置文件；
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 32
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 32
